title: A-Ibom Assembly tasks ExxonMobil, others on quality roads

organizations.name: house committee on appropriation and finance
akwa ibom state house of assembly

text:
Home » News » A-Ibom Assembly tasks ExxonMobil, others on quality roads A-Ibom Assembly tasks ExxonMobil, others on quality roads On 12:54 am In News by Tony Comments 
By Chioma Onuegbu 
U yo— MEMBERS of Akwa Ibom State House of Assembly have urged the management of ExxonMobil and other oil companies operating in the state to partner the state government in providing quality road networks for their host communities. 
House Committee on Appropriation and Finance, led by its Chairman and the member representing Esit -Eket/Ibeno constituency, Usoro Akpanusoh, made the appeal yesterday when he led members of his committee on an assessment of roads being constructed across the state. 
The lawmakers urged ExxonMobil to always live up to its social responsibility to its host communities in Akwa Ibom State. Tony
